text: Chinchón (possibly from Quechua chinchu a plant of the Tagetes family, -n a suffix) Menandra Mosquera, Quechua de Huarás, en Español e Inglés: Glosario is a mountain in the western part of the Chila mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high. It lies in the Arequipa Region, Castilla Province, Chachas District. Chinchón is situated southwest of Huayta and southeast of Aceruta. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Chinchón (mountain)
